'''14w21b''' is the twenty-sixth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.8]], released on May 22, 2014,<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140425132002/https://mojang.com/2014/05/minecraft-snapshot-14w21a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 14w21b|date=May 22, 2014|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Dinnerbone]]}}</ref> to fix a crash relating to item frames in [[14w21a]].

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=14w21b|prefix=Minecraft
|;prev
|55627|<code>Hopper: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Duplicate id value for 3!</code>
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 14w21b was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
